pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python module to escape SQL special characters and quotes in stringsinstall:`pip install sqlescapy`Assuming `dangerous_input` is a variable coming from a user input, a bad actor can exploit it to start injecting your database.```pythonfrom sqlescapy import sqlescapedangerous_input = "JhonWick'"protected_raw_statement = "\"foo_table\".username='%s'" % sqlescape(dangerous_input)protected_query = """SELECT "foo_table".*, "bar_table".*FROM "foo_table", "bar_table"WHERE "foo_table".id = "bar_table".id AND %s""" % protected_raw_statement```
